summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the behavior of audio segment handling and various audio utility functions used in speech recognition, covering file loading, multichannel support, trimming, signal-to-distortion ratio calculations, convolution matrix generation, decibel conversions, RMS measurement, Toeplitz matrix construction, noise field generation, coherence estimation, and channel selection logic.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of audio preprocessing components within the speech recognition framework, thereby improving model training and inference reliability.
